House Rules

Character Creation

1 Power shift at creation (cannot buy others)

2 background skills to be trained in (or 1 specialized) - What did you do before you became an adventurer?

Overworld Travel

1 hex = 30 miles

Can travel 30 miles by horse a day, 15 miles by foot
